descriptionMarkdown:
This book contains: - Extra fast provider / requester.
- 100% accurate provider.
- Fluid provider / requester Important: Uncheck map-setting: "Providers output existing cargo". This option exists in LTN 1.16.8 or newer. #### Extra fast provider Pluses: - Load takes few seceonds! - No need lock slots (set to 0). - Can load 1 or 2 wagoon. Minuses: - Always load full wagon. Request station should request minimum 1 wagon (request threshold should be 40 or 80 stacks). - Can delivery only 1 item at same time. (can't delivery 2 items together) Info: - How this works: Example: If requested irons, then station emit irons. Inserters sets white filters - load only irons. But when arrive train, inserters drop previus items from hand to wagons. Backwards inserters sets black filter - unload from wagon to warehouse all items except irons. #### Extra fast requester - Used together with extra fast provider - If you want delivery maximum 1 wagons, then change threshold from 80 to 40. And change max train length from 3 to 2. Or use single-wagoon blueprint. #### 100% Accurate Provider Pluses: - Load exact amount of requested items. You may delivery at time several items with any max stack sizes and any counts. And inserters hand may be any. Example: You may request from this staions: 3 sattelites + 921 irons + 16 barels + 2733 stones. Your inserter's hand may be 3 or 12, or 55, or 123, or 1000 (any). Anyway, the station will load exact count of each items. - No need lock slots. Minuses: - Can load only 1 wagon. No way to expand design for 2 or more wagons. Info: - All inserters (except load to warehouse) should have rotating speed <= 864 degrees / sec. And angle should be = 90. If you upgrade the inserters to more faster, or set smallest angle - then combinators do not have time to update status, and will load not exact. ###### Used mods: - LTN (https://mods.factorio.com/mod/LogisticTrainNetwork) - LTN Combinator Modernized (https://mods.factorio.com/mod/LTN_Combinator_Modernized) - AAI Containers & Warehouses (https://mods.factorio.com/mod/aai-containers) - Bob's Adjustable Inserters (https://mods.factorio.com/mod/bobinserters) You may see detailed info-images here: https://forums.factorio.com/viewtopic.php?p=529616#p529616. This detailed-info created for ver. 1.0. Changes of version 2.1:
- Used standart inserters & tanks. - Used standart wagoon size (40. But you may change it). - Changed "warehouse" mod. - Fluid privder threshold sets to 24999 and 49999 (This is necessary in order to avoid the factorio bug, when pumps may not fill the tanks with liquid up to 25000, but stop at a value of 24999.9) I recommend using this book together with city-block book: https://factorioprints.com/view/-NCra0sJ8BavFU3o_seg
title: LTN Stations Pro 2.1
